item.title: Resources: Identity Abolition
item.description: I recently appeared on an episode of Air-It, a podcast by Nicolene Burger and Jana Vosloo, to talk about Gender Abolition. Here are some texts that we spoke about, as well as a several others that you might find interesting. As you’ll see, it’s quite extensive and wide-ranging — sometimes even contradictory — and so is not meant as a “primer” but more as a list of sources that I find interesting around the topic.
